properties.description: A word, phrase, character, or group of characters that contains the remainder of the title information after the title proper.
properties.title: Subtitle

properties.description: Click the "add" button to add more names.
properties.title: Name

properties.description: For personal authors: format Familyname, Givenname. For corporate authors, use the full corporate name.
properties.title: Name

properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html - e.g. Artist, Creator, Designer, Engraver, Illustrator, Photographer, Printmaker, etc.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: A term that best describes the genre of the image. Use a term from the Thesaurus for Graphic Materials from the Library of Congress - http://www.loc.gov/pictures/collection/tgm/
properties.title: Genre

properties.description: The date the object was created/issued/published. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: Select an iso639-2b language (text, not code) from http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
properties.title: Language

properties.description: A unique standard number or code that distinctively identifies the resource.
properties.title: Identifier (local)

properties.description: A designation of a particular physical presentation of a resource, including the physical form or medium of material for a resource.
properties.title: Form

properties.description: A statement of the number and specific material of the units of the resource that express physical extent (e.g. dimensions, number of panels, etc.)
properties.title: Extent

properties.description: Name of a country, i.e. a political entity considered a country.
properties.title: Country

properties.description: Includes first order political divisions called provinces within a country, e.g. in Canada.
properties.title: Province

properties.description: Includes regions that have status as a jurisdiction, usually incorporating more than one first level jurisdiction.
properties.title: Region

properties.description: Name of the largest local administrative unit in various countries, e.g. England.
properties.title: County

properties.description: Name of an inhabited place incorporated as a city, town, etc.
properties.title: City

properties.description: Name of a smaller unit within a populated place, e.g., neighborhoods, parks, or streets.
properties.title: City Section

properties.description: Contains a statement of coordinates covered by the resource.
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.description: A URI to an appropriate statement from Rightsstatements.org. View details at http://rightsstatements.org

options.index: NO COPYRIGHT - OTHER KNOWN LEGAL RESTRICTIONS
IN COPYRIGHT - RIGHTS-HOLDER(S) UNLOCATABLE OR UNIDENTIFIABLE

properties.title: Rights Statement

properties.description: Additional information about the use and reproduction of the resource, including links to copyright information pages.
properties.title: Use and Reproduction

create.value: <accessCondition type="use and reproduction" displayLabel="Creative Commons license">%value%</accessCondition>
